title: AC/DC
description: Legendary Australian hard rock band known for their powerful guitar riffs, thunderous sound, and iconic songs. AC/DC has been a driving force in rock music for decades, influencing countless musicians with their high-energy performances and classic rock anthems.

title: Bullet for My Valentine
description: Welsh metalcore band known for their melodic approach to metal music, combining aggressive riffs with emotional melodies and powerful vocal performances. Masters of modern metal guitar tones.

title: Deep Purple
description: Deep Purple is an English rock band formed in 1968 in Hertford, England. The band is known for its fusion of blues-rock, hard rock, and progressive rock, and has been credited with popularizing the genre in the 1970s. Deep Purple has released several platinum-selling albums and has toured extensively worldwide.

title: Enter Shikari
description: British post-hardcore band known for their innovative approach to music, combining rock, electronic elements, and socially conscious lyrics. Enter Shikari creates dynamic guitar tones with modern production.

title: Guns and Roses
description: Legendary hard rock band that dominated the late 80s and early 90s music scene. Guns N' Roses is renowned for their epic ballads, powerful rock anthems, and distinctive guitar work that helped define classic rock.

title: Jimi Hendrix
description: Jimi Hendrix was an American guitarist, singer, and songwriter who is widely regarded as one of the most influential and innovative musicians in the history of rock and roll. He is known for his unique guitar playing style, which combined elements of blues, jazz, and rock, and for his contributions to the development of psychedelic rock and the electric guitar.

title: Led Zeppelin
description: One of the greatest rock bands of all time and pioneers of hard rock and heavy metal. Led Zeppelin created a unique sound blending blues, folk, and rock elements, producing legendary guitar tones and timeless musical masterpieces.

title: Limp Bizkit
description: Limp Bizkit is an American rock band formed in 1994 in Jacksonville, Florida. The band is known for its fusion of nu metal, alternative metal, and rap metal, and has been credited with popularizing the genre in the early 2000s. Limp Bizkit has released several platinum-selling albums and has toured extensively worldwide.

title: Lynyrd Skynyrd
description: Iconic Southern rock band known for their distinctive guitar harmonies and powerful ballads. Lynyrd Skynyrd created a unique style blending country and rock elements, producing classic American rock anthems.

title: Metallica
description: One of the most influential heavy metal bands in music history. Metallica revolutionized thrash metal with their complex compositions, powerful guitar riffs, and innovative approach to songwriting, creating timeless metal classics.

title: Nirvana
description: Iconic grunge band that transformed rock music in the 1990s. Nirvana's unique sound combined raw guitar power with emotional depth, creating alternative rock masterpieces that defined a generation and influenced modern rock music.

title: Ozzy Osborn
description: The Prince of Darkness and godfather of heavy metal, former Black Sabbath vocalist and successful solo artist. Ozzy Osbourne is renowned for his unique vocal style and massive influence on metal music development.

title: Pantera
description: Pantera is an American heavy metal band formed in 1981 in Arlington, Texas. The band is known for its aggressive sound, powerful riffs, and innovative use of rhythm guitar. Pantera has been credited with popularizing the groove metal genre and has influenced countless bands in the metal scene.

title: Red Hot Chili Peppers
description: Red Hot Chili Peppers is an American rock band formed in 1983 in Los Angeles, California. The band is known for its fusion of funk, rock, and psychedelic music, and has been credited with popularizing the genre in the 1990s. Red Hot Chili Peppers has released several platinum-selling albums and has toured extensively worldwide.

title: Slipknot
description: American nu-metal band known for their aggressive sound, masked personas, and powerful performances. Slipknot created a unique style combining heavy metal with industrial elements and complex rhythms.

title: Rammstein
description: German industrial metal band known for their powerful sound, theatrical performances, and unique style combining heavy metal with electronic elements. Rammstein creates intense, atmospheric guitar tones.

title: Radiohead
description: Radiohead is one of the most influential alternative rock bands of the modern era. Formed in Oxfordshire, England, the group is known for its groundbreaking sound, blending rock, electronic, and experimental elements. With iconic albums like OK Computer, Kid A, and In Rainbows, Radiohead has consistently pushed the boundaries of music, earning worldwide acclaim and a devoted fan base.

title: Ария
description: Aria (Ария) is one of the most influential Russian heavy metal bands, often called the “Russian Iron Maiden.” Formed in the 1980s, Aria created a unique blend of melodic metal riffs, powerful vocals, and epic lyrics. On NxRig, you’ll find guitar presets that capture Aria’s signature tones — from heavy rhythm parts to soaring solos.

title: REM
description: American alternative rock band recognized as pioneers of the genre, blending jangly guitar sounds with introspective lyrics and distinctive vocal delivery. Influential in shaping modern rock with their unique melodic style and timeless songs.

title: Ten Years After
description: British blues rock band celebrated for their electrifying guitar work, energetic performances, and fusion of blues, rock, and psychedelia. Best known for their legendary Woodstock appearance and the guitar mastery of Alvin Lee.

title: Pink Floyd
description: Iconic British rock band known for their progressive sound, philosophical lyrics, and groundbreaking concept albums. Masters of atmospheric guitar tones, psychedelic experimentation, and timeless classics that shaped modern rock music.

title: Toto
description: American rock band admired for their polished musicianship, smooth blend of rock, pop, and jazz influences, and timeless hits. Known for virtuosic guitar work, powerful vocals, and classic songs like Africa and Rosanna that defined an era of melodic rock

title: Gary Moore
description: legendary Irish guitarist celebrated for his fiery blues rock style, soulful solos, and unforgettable guitar tone that inspired generations of musicians worldwide

title: Blur
description: Iconic British band that defined the Britpop era with their catchy melodies, sharp lyrics, and inventive sound blending rock, pop, and alternative styles.

title: Blue Oyster Cult
description: American rock band famed for their fusion of hard rock, psychedelia, and progressive elements. Known for powerful guitar riffs, dark lyrical themes, and timeless classics like "(Don’t Fear) The Reaper" that shaped the sound of modern rock and metal

title: Muse
description: British rock band celebrated for their powerful fusion of alternative rock, progressive influences, and electronic elements. Known for soaring vocals, virtuosic guitar riffs, and epic anthems like Supermassive Black Hole and Knights of Cydonia that redefined modern rock.

title: Hatebreed
description: Hatebreed is an American hardcore/metalcore band known for its aggressive sound, powerful riffs, and relentless energy. Their music blends hardcore intensity with metal precision, shaping the modern heavy scene.

title: Iron Maiden
description: Iron Maiden is a legendary British heavy metal band known for its galloping riffs, powerful vocals, and epic storytelling. Their iconic sound shaped the evolution of metal worldwide.

title: Black Sabbath
description: Black Sabbath is a pioneering heavy metal band whose dark riffs, haunting atmosphere, and groundbreaking sound defined the genre and influenced generations of musicians

title: The Eagles
description: The Eagles are a legendary American rock band known for their smooth harmonies, timeless songwriting, and iconic hits that shaped the sound of classic rock.

title: The Cranberries
description: The Cranberries are an Irish rock band known for their distinctive vocals, emotive melodies, and atmospheric sound, creating timeless hits that shaped ’90s alternative rock.

title: Arctic Monkeys
description: Arctic Monkeys are a British indie rock band known for sharp lyrics, dynamic guitar work, and evolving sound, influencing modern rock with their distinctive style.

title: The Beatles
description: The Beatles are a legendary British band whose innovative songwriting, harmonies, and cultural impact transformed music history and defined the sound of modern pop and rock.

title: Chuck Berry
description: Chuck Berry was a pioneering rock and roll musician whose signature guitar riffs, energetic style, and timeless hits helped shape the foundation of modern rock music.

title: Queen
description: Queen is a legendary British rock band known for powerful vocals, innovative songwriting, and genre-blending anthems that shaped the sound of modern rock music.

title: Slayer
description: Slayer is an American thrash metal band known for its fast tempos, aggressive riffs, and dark lyrical themes, playing a key role in shaping extreme metal.

title: John Frusciante
description: John Frusciante is an influential guitarist and songwriter best known for his work with Red Hot Chili Peppers, blending melodic expression, funk rhythms, and experimental sounds.

title: Bobby Helms
description: Bobby Helms was an American country and rockabilly singer best known for the classic hit ‘Jingle Bell Rock,’ a timeless holiday favorite.

title: Elvis Presley
description: Elvis Presley was a legendary American singer and cultural icon whose groundbreaking style and charisma helped popularize rock and roll worldwide.

title: Amatory
description: Amatory is a Russian metalcore band known for heavy riffs, emotional lyrics, and a blend of metalcore, alternative, and modern metal influences.

title: George Michael
description: George Michael was a British singer and songwriter known for his soulful voice, pop anthems, and emotional depth, shaping pop music from the 1980s onward.

title: Carlos Santana
description: Carlos Santana is a legendary guitarist known for blending rock, blues, and Latin rhythms, creating a distinctive, soulful sound that influenced generations of musicians.

title: Unknown Artist
description:
Placeholder artist used for guitar tones and presets that are not based on a specific performer or recorded track.
These presets represent generic styles, eras, or use-cases rather than official artist sounds.

title: Pixies
description: Pixies are an influential alternative rock band known for loud-quiet dynamics, raw energy, and a sound that shaped modern indie and grunge music.

title: Dire Straits
description: Dire Straits are a British rock band known for Mark Knopfler’s clean guitar tone, storytelling lyrics, and a refined sound blending rock, blues, and roots music.

title: Ennio Morricone
description: Ennio Morricone was a legendary composer known for iconic film scores, unforgettable melodies, and a profound influence on cinematic and modern music.

title: Megadeth
description: Megadeth is a pioneering thrash metal band known for fast tempos, technical riffs, and politically charged lyrics, shaping the sound of modern metal.

title: The Animals
description: The Animals are a British rock band known for gritty vocals, blues-rock sound, and classic hits that shaped the British Invasion era.

title: System of a Down
description: System of a Down is an American metal band known for aggressive riffs, political lyrics, and a unique blend of metal, punk, and Armenian influences.

title: Styles Of Beyond
description: Styles Of Beyond is an American hip hop group known for rapid-fire lyrics, dark beats, and a raw underground sound, gaining wider recognition through film and game soundtracks.

title: Deftones
description: Deftones are an American alternative metal band known for atmospheric textures, heavy riffs, and emotional depth, blending metal with shoegaze and experimental elements.

title: Marilyn Manson
description: Marilyn Manson is an American artist known for provocative imagery, dark themes, and a blend of industrial rock and alternative metal that shaped 1990s rock culture.

title: The Police
description: The Police are a British rock band known for blending rock, reggae, and new wave, featuring distinctive rhythms, sharp songwriting, and iconic hits of the late 1970s and 1980s.

title: The White Stripes
description: The White Stripes are an American garage rock duo known for raw guitar riffs, minimalist sound, and blues-inspired energy that helped revive rock in the early 2000s.

title: Scorpions
description: Scorpions are a legendary hard rock band known for powerful riffs, melodic solos, and iconic anthems that shaped classic and arena rock worldwide.

title: Papa Roach
description: Papa Roach are an American rock band known for emotional lyrics, heavy riffs, and a blend of alternative metal, nu metal, and modern rock that defined the 2000s era.

title: Michael Jackson
description: Michael Jackson was the King of Pop, known for groundbreaking music, iconic dance moves, and global influence that reshaped pop culture and modern music.

title: Three Days Grace
description: Three Days Grace are a Canadian rock band known for dark, emotional lyrics, heavy guitar riffs, and a powerful alternative metal sound.

title: Gorillaz
description: Gorillaz are a virtual band blending alternative rock, hip hop, and electronic music, known for genre-crossing sound, collaborations, and animated personas.

title: Cream
description: Cream are a legendary rock supergroup known for virtuosic musicianship, blues-rock foundations, and pioneering the power trio format.

title: Van Halen
description: Van Halen are a legendary rock band known for Eddie Van Halen’s innovative guitar techniques, high-energy sound, and influential role in shaping hard rock and arena rock.

title: Mor Ve Otesi
description: Mor ve Ötesi are a Turkish alternative rock band known for melodic guitar work, introspective lyrics, and a modern rock sound with strong emotional depth.

title: Living End
description: The Living End are an Australian punk rock band known for high-energy songs, driving bass lines, and a blend of punk, rockabilly, and alternative rock influences.

title: Steve Lukather
description: Steve Lukather is a renowned guitarist and songwriter, best known for his work with Toto, combining technical precision, melodic solos, and versatile session work.

title: Creedence Clearwater Revival
description: Creedence Clearwater Revival were an American rock band known for roots-driven sound, catchy riffs, and timeless songs blending rock, blues, and Americana.

title: Boston
description: Boston are an American rock band known for polished production, soaring vocals, and melodic guitar-driven anthems that defined classic arena rock.
